context: Global manufacturing company evaluating establishment of comprehensive supplier diversity program to meet regulatory requirements and improve market access

request.purpose: Launch supplier diversity initiative with certification program and supplier development support
request.justification: Meet increasing regulatory requirements and improve access to diverse markets while enhancing supply chain resilience

decision_process.outcome: Comprehensive program framework established with clear certification criteria and support mechanisms
Strong stakeholder support secured with supplier participation commitments
Compliance framework established with clear legal protections and reporting requirements
Positive business case with 3-year payback through improved market access and supplier performance
